title: Is There An Honor Lvl 0 Bug?
body:
Good day,

I currently am Honor Level 0 and have been for quite some time. I went and counted and have played over *120* games since this honor reduction due to a 25 game chat restriction. Since then have had no further violations. I do not recall seeing the system pop up telling me I've unlocked honor again, which I believe I read somewhere that this must occur before you actually start gaining honor, and until then it's just a time period of it being locked. However, I do leave my client up when I'm not around and thought maybe I had missed the pop up, since I feel that by now I should be able to be climbing out of this sewer. 

Is there currently a bug where you can not leave honor lvl 0? 

Thanks to anybody with information - I'm just curious about my situation.

There are no known bugs that I am aware of. Most people seem to unlock the honor within a week or two of active playing. If that has not been the case for you, then one of two things is happening:

1. You aren't playing as actively as some other players.

2. You're getting reported at a just barely sub-punishment level - i.e. your behavior has improved *slightly* but you are still being validly reported in games.
